info.name: Discord - Arc Dark
info.description: A theme for Discord that changes the colors to match the Arc Dark GTK scheme.
info.additionalInfo:
As of 08/03/2017, I've begun rewriting this theme from scratch to work with Discord's new HTML layout. Some elements are not themed yet, but I'll be working on it through the coming weeks. Thanks for your patience!

Update (08/15/2017): Most of the site is now themed. If you notice any unthemed elements, please leave a comment!

08/05/2018: Theme completely rewritten to support Discord's new css overhaul.

data.title: Mind Porting it to Better Discord?
Fixed broken colours (mostly in member list)
Could you please make this compatible with Better Discord?
Could you please make this compatible with Better Discord?
